about_the_game:
In the vast expanse of the universe, there are multiple independent and harmonious dimensions, each governed by different deities. However, as time passed, some malicious deities began to instigate conflicts among the dimensions, leading to a disastrous war. This war tore the sky, shattered the dimensional structures, and threw the universe into chaos.

Amid the chaos, Ariston, the illegitimate son of Zeus, emerged and used the power of the "Heart of Harmony" to end the war. But he was cursed by the evil deities and became an immortal ghost. Losing his memory, he started wandering among the dimensions.

During his search for relief from the curse, Ariston met goddesses from various dimensions and gained new powers and allies by forming contracts with them. He gradually recovered his strength and memory, began to repair the rifts in the universe, and finally lifted the curse, bringing new harmony and balance to the universe and becoming its guardian.

And you are the variable in this war.

Exquisite graphics, close contact with goddesses, ultimate experience
Take turns to conquer 40+ goddesses, with dubbing in all languages, lead the goddess team on a journey to explore the mysteries of the universe.


Improve intimacy, unlock more intimate poses and high-definition pictures
Meet goddesses, improve favorability, unlock special plots, embrace intimacy, and experience pleasure


Roguelike gameplay, never get tired of clearing levels and solving puzzles
Unique level design and roguelike elements, with Q-version images, dozens of skill card combinations, experience the pleasure of battle




Nearly 100 sexy and exquisite CGs, 300,000-word novel-level script, immersive experience
Each goddess is accompanied by a unique high-definition CG animation, providing an immersive experience in the advancement of the plot, and offering a double enjoyment of both visual and reading pleasures
